content.rendered:
DemoJam: Custom Themes for Communities
Dreamforce 2018DevZone[addtoany media=”https://i1.wp.com/meighanrockssf.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/demojam.jpg” buttons=’Twitter,facebook,linkedin,email’]


Our Presentation

Overview
With the Summer ’18 release we launched pre-built themes – built by our own UX teams at Salesforce. Now, we are allowing you to build your own custom themes, package them up, and share and re-use them internally as well as sharing them across the entire Salesforce ecosystem. To celebrate, we’re hosting a DemoJam where our Trailblazers will showcase their work, and the winner will be declared for the sharpest, coolest, and most beautiful theme.

The Presenters



Meighan Brodkey

Meighan Broadvalue Brodkey’s Blog Conversion ThemeSenior Community Cloud Specialist | Salesforce MVP, System Dot Debug 

Meighan’s Twitter



Nathan Pepper

Paprika ThemeAdvanced Salesforce Developer at CRM Science

Nathan’s Twitter

​​​​​David Green
Sr. Director of Product Management, Community CloudSalesforce



Thomas Krawczyk

Product Marketing Salesforce, Salesforce

Thomas’ Twitter

Presentation Screenshots Page Layouts Lead Banner Custom Page 2:1 Shout out to me in the Community Cloud Keynote

Materials



The Recording

Here is the Video

Watch Video



The Session Link

Here is the session

View Session
